sentences: Maagia on iidne kunst ja teadus.
Lapsed armastavad lugusid maagiast ja n천idudest.
See film n채itab kuidas maagia toimib igap채evas elus.
context: Maagia is the Estonian word for magic or sorcery. It refers to supernatural practices and arts that involve influencing people or things through mystical means, rituals, and spells. The term encompasses both 'must maagia' (black magic) used in medieval times to influence evil spirits and 'valge maagia' (white magic) used to influence good spirits. Maagia can also describe any very powerful, almost magical influence that something or someone has, such as 'arvude, salap채raste helide maagia' - the magic of numbers, mysterious sounds.
